author: Simon Difford
description: Dark rich sugar, equally dark and richly flavoured rum, sweetened and spiced with the clove and cinnamon flavours of falernum and freshened with citrus juice. All served long with crushed ice.
name: Rum Swizzle
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
15 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: POUR ingredients into chilled glass and two-thirds fill with crushed ice
SWIZZLE with a swizzle stick (or churn with a barspoon)
Add more crushed ice to fill and SWIZZLE some more
